name: @smallhillcz/openapi-sdk
description: OpenAPI SDK generator for typescript+axios using @openapitools/openapi-generator-cli with custom templates

scripts.release: git switch release && git merge master --ff-only && git push --follow-tags && git switch master
scripts.release:patch: git switch master && git pull && npm version patch && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: git switch master && git pull && npm version minor && git push && npm run release
scripts.release:major: git switch master && git pull && npm version major && git push && npm run release
